backend/main.mo: Actor stores contact info and lead forms, provides query methods to fetch them, and a shared function to submit new leads.
feature_evidence.json: Defines feature evidence entries listing required UI updates, affected files, and associated components and tests.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains short summaries of all frontend files describing their purpose and UI behavior.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining global OKLCH color tokens and theming for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading fonts, metadata, and mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component rendering TopBar, navigation, all page sections, footer, and a floating WhatsApp button.
frontend/src/components/king-kingdom/con: Displays all phone numbers as clickable links with optional icon and separator.
frontend/src/components/king-kingdom/cta: Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/king-kingdom/Flo: Fixed WhatsApp button linking to configured WhatsApp URL with icon and hover animation.
frontend/src/components/king-kingdom/Foo: Footer showing branding, quick links, contact details, and social icons using centralized contact and social config.
frontend/src/components/king-kingdom/Hea: Sticky responsive header with navigation links, CTAs, scroll handling, and mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/king-kingdom/sec: Shows information about the company, including who they are, their promise, vision, mission, and values.
Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
Provides a contact form with validation and displays address, phone, WhatsApp, and email details.
Hero section with headline, description, scroll-to-section buttons, and services list.
Shows four highlight cards describing key company strengths.
Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
Displays a grid of sample project cards with titles and locations.
Outlines the six-step workflow from initial contact to project handover.
Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
Lists construction-related services in a responsive grid.
Shows reasons to choose the company, each with an icon, title, and description.
frontend/src/components/king-kingdom/Top: Renders a top bar showing phone numbers, WhatsApp, email, hours, and address using CONTACT_INFO.
frontend/src/config/contact.ts: Exports all contact details including phones, WhatsApp, email, address, and hours.
frontend/src/config/socialLinks.ts: Defines social media link objects and a helper to return only entries with valid URLs.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current identity, invalidating queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, login/logout handling, and initializes AuthClient with stored identities.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS base, components, and utilities with custom theme variables for the King Kingdom design.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a utility function that merges class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/lib/whatsapp.ts: Builds and opens WhatsApp URLs using configured contact info.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, fonts, shadows, animations, and other theme settings.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, features, and pending requests for the King Kingdom project.
